alert.note: Alert for Coastal Jefferson; Eastern Orleans; Lower Lafourche; Lower Plaquemines; Lower St. Bernard; Lower Terrebonne; Southeast St. Tammany (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Coastal Flood Watch issued January 07 at 3:14AM CST until January 09 at 12:00PM CST by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT FROM MONDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH TUESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Significant coastal flooding possible. * WHERE...In Louisiana, Lower Terrebonne, Lower Lafourche, Coastal Jefferson Parish, Lower Plaquemines, Lower St. Bernard, Southeast St. Tammany and Eastern Orleans Parishes. In Mississippi, Southern Hancock, Southern Harrison and Southern Jackson Counties. * WHEN...From Monday afternoon through Tuesday morning. * IMPACTS...Numerous roads may be closed. Low lying property including homes, businesses, and some critical infrastructure may be inundated. Some shoreline erosion may occur. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Impacts more apparent during high tide cycles.
info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Jefferson; Eastern Orleans; Lower Lafourche; Lower Plaquemines; Lower St. Bernard; Lower Terrebonne; Southeast St. Tammany
